title: Plain Text Filter (BETA) Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi Plain Text Filter (BETA) Filter

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim Trail)
configurations.description: Text files; trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.base.Parameters

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim All)
configurations.description: Text files; leading and trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=true
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.plaintext.base.Parameters

rules.description: List of regex patterns to detect inline codes

pattern.description: Regex pattern for inline code detection

sample.description: Sample text to test patterns against

useAllRulesWhenTesting.description: Test all rules together or individually

simplifierRules.description: Simplifier rules for code type normalization
